name: Merge Mansion
storyline:
Upon being given the keys to a secret gate leading to a massive mansion in her grandmother’s backyard, Maddie realizes that there might be more to her family than meets the eye. But why is Grandma Ursula so secretive about it? And how come she never spoke about any of it?

You will need to help Maddie investigate her family’s past by merging your way through the grounds, fixing up, cleaning up, and restoring the mansion and its gardens to their former glory. Clearing up the mansion could be Maddie’s only hope to clear up the dark mystery of the Boulton family’s past.
summary: Merge Mansion is a mobile puzzle game where players renovate a mansion by merging various objects and solving match-3 puzzles. The game combines elements of interior design, storytelling, and puzzle-solving, with an ultimate goal to restore the mansion to its former glory while uncovering the mysteries of its past.
